this_title: And the Worst Thing Is You Do It to Yourself
introduction: While going about repetitive domestic activities, someone hazily recalls events from the past. This film explores the distrust in one’s own memory when addressing subjects for which suspicion is deeply inscribed into the public discourse.源自：https://doclisboa.org/2023/en/filmes/and-the-worst-thing-is-you-do-it-to-yourself/
chinese_title: And the Worst Thing Is You Do It to Yourself
